definition: dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor
building/shop/term for certain service establishments/embassy or consulate/schoolroom (old)/CL:家[jia1]

sentences.english: They decided to have something to eat before going to home, but unfortunately the only spot open was a seedy bar-and-grill with a questionable reputation.
sentences.chinese: 但很不巧只有一家名声不好的下等酒吧烤菜馆开着门。

sentences.english: In fact, the Japanese whale meat to the restaurant and hotel, just want to get rich.
sentences.chinese: 其实日本人把鲸肉送到菜馆和饭店里，就想发财。

sentences.english: Sichuan Restaurant is the best restaurant of Sichuan style in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 太好了，四川饭店是北京最好的川菜馆。

sentences.english: There’s a very good Cantonese restaurant in your hotel.
sentences.chinese: 在你的饭店里有一家非常好的广东菜馆。

sentences.english: Cantonese restaurants take pride in their enormous fish tanks.
sentences.chinese: 广东菜馆以有大量的鱼为傲。

sentences.english: In many cities you can find Chinese restaurants.
sentences.chinese: 在许多城市你能发现中国菜馆。

sentences.english: There is a nice Hunanese Restaurant up ahead on the Chinese Food Street.
sentences.chinese: 前面就是中华美食街，有家不错的湘菜馆。

sentences.english: Anna: I know a good Chinese restaurant. It's near here.
sentences.chinese: 我知道一家很好的中国菜馆，离这里很近。

sentences.english: Let's go to a Sichuan Restaurant to hxdye a big meal.
sentences.chinese: 让我们去川菜馆大吃一顿吧。

sentences.english: Two Door Restaurant is a northwest-style restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 两扇门菜馆，西北风味的餐馆。

sentences.english: Are there any vegetarian restaurants in Taipei?
Among lots of regionally flavor restaurants in Beijing, the Xiangcai restaurant also expand rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 在北京各种地方风味餐馆中，湘菜馆也可谓异军突起。

sentences.english: The Cantonese restaurant on the fourth floor.
At noon he went to eat at a small Western-style restaurant in the neighborhood, afraid to speak to anybody.
sentences.chinese: 午时一个人到邻近小西菜馆里去饭，怕跟人谈话。

sentences.english: They decided to have somethellong to eat before goint home, but unfortunately the only spot open was a seedy bar-and-grill with a questionable reputation.
sentences.chinese: 但很不巧只有一家名声欠好的劣等酒吧烤菜馆开着门。

sentences.english: Could you suggest a good Chuan restaurant for me?
sentences.chinese: 你能给我介绍一个号的川菜馆吗？

definition: signature dish/a restaurant’s most famous dish
